about_the_game:
This Starlight Pack includes 32 starry Clothing Items, 7 starry Wigs, 10 starry Furniture Items, 1 starry Mount, and 2 starry Pets.


If you’ve dreamed of being a guardian of the stars, then look no further! The Starlight Pack has an incredible collection of 52 starry-themed items that will make your farm look and feel magical!

Pack includes:
  • Starlight Furniture Set: Starlight Chair, Starlight Table, Starlight Couch, Starlight Wardrobe, Starlight Bed, Starlight Storage Chest, Starlight Rug, Starlight End Table, Starlight Night Light, and Starlight Lamp
  • Starlight Leader Outfit Set: Starlight Leader Wig, Starlight Leader Dress, Starlight Leader Gloves, and Starlight Leader Boots
  • Emerald Starlight Outfit Set: Starlight Emerald Wig, Starlight Emerald Cloak, Starlight Emerald Gloves, and Starlight Emerald Boots
  • Amethyst Starlight Outfit Set: Starlight Amethyst Wig, Starlight Amethyst Dress, Starlight Amethyst Gloves, and Starlight Amethyst Pants
  • Ruby Starlight Outfit Set: Starlight Ruby Wig, Starlight Ruby Shirt, Starlight Ruby Gloves, and Starlight Ruby Pants
  • Starlight Champion Outfit Set: Starlight Head Wings, Starlight Champion Coat, Starlight Champion Pants, and Starlight Champion Cape
  • Pink Starlight Outfit Set: Starlight Pink Wig, Starlight Wings, Starlight Pink Dress, Starlight Pink Gloves, and Starlight Pink Boots
  • Lapis Starlight Outfit Set: Starlight Lapis Wig, Starlight Lapis Gloves, Starlight Lapis Boots, and Starlight Lapis Cloak
  • Starlight Outfit Set: Starlight Tiara, Starlight Coat, Starlight Gloves, and Starlight Pants
  • Starlight Armor Set: Starlight Streak Wig, Starlight Armored Chest, and Starlight Armored Pants
  • Starlight Mascot Outfit Set: Starlight Mascot Hat, Starlight Mascot Shirt, and Starlight Mascot Pants
  • Starlight Motorcycle Mount
  • Celesti, the Fey Star Pet
  • Twinkle, the Star Pet

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
